metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9869 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: The II_step_one function in layer2.c in mpglib, as used in libmpgdecoder.a in LAME 3.99.5 and other products, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted audio file.

notes.Note: ratliff> reproducer doesn't crash on t-z (no ASAN)

criterions.comment: lame: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
